page.title: 14SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content:
The{radio telescope}dish (ref.SJ 703760) is part of the large complex centred on Jodrell Bank and operated by Manchester University Department of Astronomy. ---------------
Plumley{Nature Reserve}(ref:SJ 7075) is administered by the Cheshire Conservation Trust. The land was formerly owned by Ammonia Soda Company Limited (hence the naming of nearby Ascol Drive), and then by Brunner Mond Company (forerunner of I.C.I.). The lime beds have an interesting flora and fauna with rare orchids and many wading birds.
